game.name: CDL for a UFO
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Play as a starship captain who is woefully unqualified for the job. With an unfamiliar control panel in front of you, all 45 keys of your keyboard are randomized at the start of every attempt. Guide your ship through a variety of obstacles in an attempt to make it to your destination in one piece.
